item.title: Israel Deports Greta Thunberg and Other Activists on Gaza Aid Boat
item.description: The environmental campaigner was sent home after she and others on the intercepted ship said they were trying to deliver food and medical supplies.

item.title: European Union Unveils Fresh Sanctions on Russia, Including a Nord Stream Ban
item.description: Ursula von der Leyen, president of the European Commission, announced a proposal meant to ramp up pressure on Moscow.

item.title: U.K., Australia, Canada and Others Impose Sanctions on Far-Right Israeli Ministers
item.description: The coordinated move highlights the hardening of several countries’ stance toward Israel amid the dire humanitarian crisis in Gaza.

item.title: US and China Talk Trade as Fight Over Rare Earths Escalates
item.description: Officials from the world’s largest economies will try to strike a deal Tuesday to relax painful export restrictions that they have imposed on each oth...

item.title: At Least 9 Dead After Austria School Shooting, Police Say
item.description: The victims names and ages have not been released. The police said the gunman also died, in an apparent suicide. The attack is among the worst school ...
